text:
iShares ®

iShares Trust

Supplement dated October 7, 2024

to the currently effective Summary Prospectus,
Prospectus

and Statement of Additional Information (the
SAI) for the

iShares iBonds Dec 2024 Term Muni Bond ETF*
(IBMM) (the Fund)

*The iShares iBonds Dec 2024 Term Muni Bond
ETF may also conduct business as the iBonds
Dec 2024 Term Muni Bond ETF.

On March 16, 2018 in connection with the
establishment of the Fund, the Board of
Trustees of the Trust approved the planned
liquidation, dissolution and termination
of the Fund. As a result, the last day of
trading in the Fund on Cboe BZX Exchange, Inc.
(Cboe BZX) will be December 2, 2024. Cboe
BZX will suspend trading in the Fund before
the open of trading on December 3, 2024, and
shares
of the Fund will no longer be available for
new investments as of this date. Proceeds of
the liquidation are currently scheduled to be
sent to shareholders on December 5, 2024. The
Funds final net asset value, as calculated on
December 2, 2024, will include any costs
associated with the liquidation expected to be
borne by the Fund.

Because shares of the Fund will not be traded
on
Cboe BZX during the period between December 3,
2024 and December 5, 2024, we cannot assure
you that there will be a trading market for
your shares. Further, during this period, the
Fund will be in the process of closing down
and
liquidating its portfolio, which may result in
the Fund not being able to track its
Underlying Index (by December 3, 2024, the
Underlying Index value will be represented
almost entirely by cash as no securities will
remain in the Underlying
Index). After December 2, 2024, shareholders
that remain invested in the Fund will receive
the entire amount of their pro rata share of
the liquidation proceeds on or about December
5, 2024, subject to their brokerage firms
processes.

Shareholders may sell their holdings of the
Fund prior to December 3, 2024 and may incur
the usual and customary brokerage commissions
associated
with the sale of Fund shares. If you still
hold shares of the Fund on December 5, 2024,
the Fund will automatically redeem your shares
for cash based on the net asset value as of
the close of business on December 2, 2024,
which will
include any dividends or distributions
calculated as of that date.

If you are subject to federal income tax, the
liquidation of the Fund will result in one or
more
taxable events for you. A sale or exchange of
Fund shares prior to the liquidation will
generally give rise to a capital gain or loss
to you for federal income tax purposes. In
connection with the liquidation, the Fund may
declare tax exempt or
taxable distributions of its investment income
and/or taxable distributions of its net
capital gain. Any liquidation proceeds paid to
you should generally be treated as received by
you in exchange for your shares and will
therefore generally give
rise to a capital gain or loss depending on
your tax basis. Please refer to the Taxes

disclosure beginning on page 68 of the SAI and
consult your own tax advisor about the
potential tax consequences of the Funds
liquidation, including any state, local,
foreign or other tax
consequences.

If you have any questions, please call
1-800-iShares (1-800-474-2737).

iShares is a registered trademark of BlackRock
Fund Advisors or its affiliates.

IS-A-IBMM-1024

PLEASE RETAIN THIS SUPPLEMENT

FOR FUTURE REFERENCE
